#summary Tutorial on PMTK3


These are unfinished notes on how to use PMTK3. They will
be completed during September 2010.

 * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/tutorial/html/tutFoundations.html Foundations]

  * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/tutorial/html/tutSupervised.html  Supervised learning] (classification and regression)

 * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/tutorial/html/tutLVM.html Latent variable models] (mixture models, PCA, HMMs, etc.)

 * [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/tutorial/html/tutGM.html Graphical models] (Bayes nets, MRFs, etc.)
